story.title: Straight Forward
story.content: Aries hate sneaky people. They respect people who are straight forward, honest and direct.

story.title: Go Crazy
story.content: Anything slow irritates an Aries like crazy. Slow computers, slow phones, and slow people. An Aries has little to no patience.

story.title: Tough Cookie
story.content: An Aries woman needs a real man, not a boy. She is one tough cookie to handle.

story.title: Fearless
story.content: An Aries isn't afraid to do something that they think is right, even if everyone is against them.

story.title: Strength
story.content: Independent, Generous, Optimistic, Enthusiastic, Courageous.

story.title: Weakness
story.content: Moody, Short tempered, Self-involved, Impulsive, Impatient.

story.title: Likes
story.content: Comfortable clothes, taking on leadership roles, physical challenges, individual sports.

story.title: Dislikes
story.content: Inactivity, delays, work that does not use one's talents.

story.title: Mission
story.content: To inspire others with your courage and lead them on the journey ahead.

story.title: First Impression
story.content: When people first meet you, they know straightaway you are a force to be reckoned with.

story.title: Crystal Clear
story.content: You waste no time in making your desires known and always make the most of any opportunity that comes your way.

story.title: Friends
story.content: Aries need a range of different personalities in order to close their circle of friends.

story.title: Family
story.content: Although, they are not enough in touch with their family, it is always in their hearts.

story.title: Open Heart
story.content: For an aries, a friend for life and no matter how many years go by, they will always have an open heart for you.

story.title: Compatibility
story.content: Aries, Leo, Sagittarius.

story.title: True Love
story.content: You wear your heart on your sleeve and seek true love. You are looking for the one special person who will win your heart.

story.title: Equality
story.content: Women with Aries strongly positioned, seek equality with men in every aspect.

story.title: Excitement
story.content: Dating an Aries never lacks excitement, they love to flirt.

story.title: Compatibility
story.content: Gemini, Libra, Aquarius.

story.title: Be Patience
story.content: Recognize that developing some patience can help you win.

story.title: Hobby
story.content: Take up a hobby that involves manual hands-on work.

story.title: Be Gracious
story.content: Be gracious in defeat.

story.title: Gift
story.content: Your special gift to the world is bravery and leadership.

story.title: People Like You
story.content: Jackie Chan - Martial Artist

story.title: People Like You
story.content: Charlie Chaplin - Comic

story.title: People Like You
story.content: Gloria Steinem - Journalist

story.title: People Like You
story.content: Jane Goodall - Primatologist
